name: note-composer-compound
title: Note-composer Compound
oneLiner: A compound composer for note-composer content

apiDoc.name: NoteComposerRoot
apiDoc.description: Root component for compound note composer builder pattern. Creates context for nested NoteComposer subcomponents (Textarea, Media, Submit, etc.). Supports reply threading, publish/error callbacks, and Svelte 5 snippet composition. Uses createNoteComposer builder for state management. Exports NoteComposer.Inline, NoteComposer.Modal, NoteComposer.Card, and NoteComposer.Minimal variants.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance (uses context if not provided)

props.name: replyTo
props.description: Event being replied to for threading

props.name: onPublish
props.description: Callback when note is published successfully

props.name: children
props.description: Svelte 5 snippet for composer content composition
